title: A Piramis
overview: The brand new gameshow of TV2, The Pyramid! There are a total of 10 questions and 24 balls that separate the game pairs from the prize of up to hundreds of millions of dollars. The game is played by two pairs, competing against each other in three questions, who can collect more money. Those lucky ones who have a bigger amount can be millionaires in a single show, but it may also happen that all of their dreams are scattered in one glimpse. In the Pyramid, every decision and every answer has a serious price. Particularly when a member of the pair is separated and enters the interior of the Pyramid, leaving him alone, without any external help, to answer the quiz questions alone, while his companion leaves the balls out there. Exciting play, turn-by-turn moments, dramatic decisions, huge prizes and failures, this is offered by The Pyramid!
